last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jusaburo takes to the stage after a three-year absence to perform in the New Year Noh recital, where he is forced to face a heartbreaking truth.

name: Story of My Family!!!
overview: The members of the Miyama Family who have been living separately decide to live together again. Although bothersome, living together somehow makes everyone feel loved.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When washed-up pro wrestler Juichi learns that his father is in critical condition, he rushes to the hospital, where he has an awkward family reunion.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jusaburo declares that Juichi will succeed him as head of the Miyama school, angering his disciples. Yosuke informs his siblings of his discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After learning of Jusaburo’s fall, Juichi hurries to the hospital but is unable to say why he wasn’t with him. Later, Jusaburo composes a bucket list.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A concerned Juichi asks Jugemu about a curious entry on his father’s bucket list. Hideo and Daisu begin practicing together for a Noh performance.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Jugemu suddenly adopts a rebellious attitude. While Sakura has a realization about Super Zeami Machine's identity, Juichi proposes a family vacation.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Juichi and his family continue on their trip, but Jusaburo insists on making detours to apologize to all the women he once pledged his love to.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Juichi for a response to her confession. Later, Juichi angers Yuka during a meeting with their lawyers about custody of Hideo.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Jusaburo tells his family that he will prepare for his death and leave his savings to Sakura, who flatly declines. Juichi injures his Achilles tendon.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: After Jugemu returns to the Miyama house, Juichi takes him to see their father at the nursing home. Sakura feels that Juichi has no time for her.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Jusaburo takes to the stage after a three-year absence to perform in the New Year Noh recital, where he is forced to face a heartbreaking truth.
